segments.source_content: ğŸ‰ It is theÂ [**official launch of Docusaurus 2.0**](https://docusaurus.io/blog/2022/08/01/announcing-docusaurus-2.0?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)!

segments.source_content: It is theÂ **Meta Open Source (Facebook)**Â project I maintain: a documentation static-site-generator, based on Node.js and React. It allows you to focus on content: just write Markdown files. Docusaurus is truly customizable and respects your company's branding. It is already powering many great docs sites you know: React-Native, Supabase, Redux, Tauri, Electron, Courier, Ionic, Figma, Snapchat, Prettier, Babel, Solana, Cardano...

segments.source_content: ## What is Docusaurus?

translations.fr: ## Qu'est-ce que Docusaurus ?
translations.en: ## Qu'est-ce que Docusaurus ?

segments.source_content: Meta has a lot of internal/external projects, which have to be documented each time. It's hard enough to write docs, and if you have to customize a site each time, it becomes a time sink.

translations.fr: Meta a de nombreux projets internes/externes, qui doivent chacun Ãªtre documentÃ©s. Ã‰crire de la documentation est dÃ©jÃ  assez difficile, et si vous devez personnaliser un site Ã  chaque fois, cela devient une perte de temps.
translations.en: Meta a de nombreux projets internes/externes, chacun nÃ©cessitant une documentation. Ã‰crire de la documentation est dÃ©jÃ  assez difficile, et si vous devez personnaliser un site Ã  chaque fois, cela devient chronophage.

segments.source_content: In 2017 they started copy/pasting a Jekyll template for each project, but it quickly became difficult to maintain.

translations.fr: En 2017, ils ont commencÃ© Ã  copier/coller un modÃ¨le Jekyll pour chaque projet, mais cela est rapidement devenu difficile Ã  maintenir.
translations.en: En 2017, ils ont commencÃ© Ã  copier/coller un modÃ¨le Jekyll pour chaque projet, mais cela est rapidement devenu difficile Ã  maintenir.

segments.source_content: In 2017, they decided to create Docusaurus, a React-based static site generator in Node.js, which will "hide" the technical stack of the site and allow toÂ **focus on the content**: writingÂ **Markdown**Â files. It is a bit like Create-React-App, but for creating content sites: docs, blog, landing pages...

translations.fr: En 2017, ils ont dÃ©cidÃ© de crÃ©er Docusaurus, un gÃ©nÃ©rateur de site statique basÃ© sur React en Node.js, qui "cache" la pile technique du site et permet de **se concentrer sur le contenu** : Ã©crire des fichiers **Markdown**. C'est un peu comme Create-React-App, mais pour crÃ©er des sites de contenu : documentation, blog, pages de destination...
translations.en: En 2017, ils ont dÃ©cidÃ© de crÃ©er Docusaurus, un gÃ©nÃ©rateur de site statique basÃ© sur React en Node.js, qui "cachait" la pile technique du site et permettait de **se concentrer sur le contenu** : Ã©crire des fichiers **Markdown**. C'est un peu comme Create-React-App, mais pour crÃ©er des sites de contenu : documentation, blog, pages d'accueil...

segments.source_content: ## Toward Docusaurus v2

translations.fr: ## Vers Docusaurus v2
translations.en: ## Vers Docusaurus v2

segments.source_content: Following the release of v1, Meta realized some limitations of v1:

translations.fr: Suite Ã  la sortie de la v1, Meta a constatÃ© certaines limitations de la v1 :
translations.en: AprÃ¨s la sortie de la v1, Meta a pris conscience de certaines limitations de la v1 :

segments.source_content:
- uses React but only on the server side: no hydration nor Single-Page-App navigation
- the repo was quite monolithic, difficult to maintain and test
- not very extensible, there was no plugin system
- the theming was relatively limited, and v1 sites look very similar

translations.fr:
- utilise React uniquement cÃ´tÃ© serveur : pas d'hydratation ni de navigation en application monopage
- le dÃ©pÃ´t Ã©tait assez monolithique, difficile Ã  maintenir et tester
- peu extensible, absence de systÃ¨me de plugins
- le thÃ¨me Ã©tait relativement limitÃ©, les sites v1 se ressemblaient beaucoup
translations.en:
- utilise React uniquement cÃ´tÃ© serveur : pas d'hydratation ni de navigation en application monopage
- le dÃ©pÃ´t Ã©tait assez monolithique, difficile Ã  maintenir et tester
- peu extensible, il n'y avait pas de systÃ¨me de plugins
- le thÃ¨me Ã©tait relativement limitÃ©, et les sites v1 se ressemblaient beaucoup

segments.source_content: In 2018, Meta decided toÂ **re-create Docusaurus from scratch**, with a brand new architecture:

translations.fr: En 2018, Meta a dÃ©cidÃ© de **recrÃ©er Docusaurus Ã  partir de zÃ©ro**, avec une architecture entiÃ¨rement nouvelle :
translations.en: En 2018, Meta a dÃ©cidÃ© deÂ **recrÃ©er Docusaurus Ã  partir de zÃ©ro**, avec une toute nouvelle architecture :

segments.source_content:
- React used client and server side (like Next.js, Remix, Gatsby...)
- Plugin system: allows the community to contribute useful features (OpenAPI integration, local search engine, Sass support...)
- Much more flexible theming system: possible to override any React component of the theme
- MDX (Markdown + React) to make your documentation interactive

translations.fr:
- React utilisÃ© cÃ´tÃ© client et serveur (comme Next.js, Remix, Gatsby...)
- SystÃ¨me de plugins : permet Ã  la communautÃ© de contribuer des fonctionnalitÃ©s utiles (intÃ©gration OpenAPI, moteur de recherche local, support Sass...)
- SystÃ¨me de thÃ¨mes bien plus flexible : possibilitÃ© de surcharger tout composant React du thÃ¨me
- MDX (Markdown + React) pour rendre votre documentation interactive
translations.en:
- React utilisÃ© cÃ´tÃ© client et serveur (comme Next.js, Remix, Gatsby...)
- SystÃ¨me de plugins : permet Ã  la communautÃ© de contribuer des fonctionnalitÃ©s utiles (intÃ©gration OpenAPI, moteur de recherche local, support Sass...)
- SystÃ¨me de thÃ¨mes beaucoup plus flexible : possibilitÃ© de surcharger n'importe quel composant React du thÃ¨me
- MDX (Markdown + React) pour rendre votre documentation interactive

segments.source_content: Docusaurus 2.0 has been in alpha/beta forÂ **4 years**Â ğŸ¤ª, and we finally released theÂ **first stable version**! We delayed this release because it wasn't obvious to respect Semantic Versioning before.

translations.fr: Docusaurus 2.0 est restÃ© en alpha/bÃªta pendant **4 ans** ğŸ¤ª, et nous avons enfin publiÃ© la **premiÃ¨re version stable** ! Nous avons retardÃ© cette sortie car il n'Ã©tait pas Ã©vident de respecter le versionnage sÃ©mantique auparavant.
translations.en: Docusaurus 2.0 est restÃ© en alpha/bÃªta pendantÂ **4 ans**Â ğŸ¤ª, et nous avons enfin publiÃ© laÂ **premiÃ¨re version stable** ! Nous avons retardÃ© cette sortie car il n'Ã©tait pas Ã©vident de respecter le versionnage sÃ©mantique auparavant.

segments.source_content: Today, Docusaurus v2 is available with a lot of features, and it would be difficult to list them all: docs, blog, versioning, theming, dark mode, i18n, a11y, SEO, TypeScript, PWA, Algolia DocSearch, MDX...

translations.fr: Aujourd'hui, Docusaurus v2 est disponible avec de nombreuses fonctionnalitÃ©s difficiles Ã  toutes lister : docs, blog, gestion de versions, thÃ¨mes, mode sombre, i18n, a11y, SEO, TypeScript, PWA, Algolia DocSearch, MDX...
translations.en: Aujourd'hui, Docusaurus v2 est disponible avec de nombreuses fonctionnalitÃ©s, et il serait difficile de toutes les lister : documentation, blog, versionnage, thÃ¨mes, mode sombre, i18n, accessibilitÃ©, SEO, TypeScript, PWA, Algolia DocSearch, MDX...

segments.source_content: ## Who uses Docusaurus 2.0?

translations.fr: ## Qui utilise Docusaurus 2.0 ?
translations.en: ## Qui utilise Docusaurus 2.0 ?

segments.source_content: A lot of companies have already adopted Docusaurus 2.0 despite the fact that it is in beta. The v2 is already much more popular than the v1, and we have almost half of the npm downloads of Gatsby!

translations.fr: De nombreuses entreprises ont adoptÃ© Docusaurus 2.0 malgrÃ© son statut bÃªta. La v2 est dÃ©jÃ  bien plus populaire que la v1, avec prÃ¨s de la moitiÃ© des tÃ©lÃ©chargements npm de Gatsby !
translations.en: De nombreuses entreprises ont dÃ©jÃ  adoptÃ© Docusaurus 2.0 malgrÃ© son statut bÃªta. La v2 est dÃ©jÃ  bien plus populaire que la v1, et nous atteignons presque la moitiÃ© des tÃ©lÃ©chargements npm de Gatsby !

translations.fr: Notre [**vitrine de sites**](https://docusaurus.io/showcase?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter) recense dÃ©jÃ  prÃ¨s de 300 sites.

segments.source_content: And it is far from being exhaustive since so many sites have not yet been added:Â [Figma](https://www.figma.com/plugin-docs/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter),Â [Snapchat](https://docs.snap.com/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter),Â [Courier](https://www.courier.com/docs/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter),Â [1Password](https://developer.1password.com/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)...

translations.fr: Elle reste loin d'Ãªtre exhaustive avec de nombreux sites non encore ajoutÃ©s : [Figma](https://www.figma.com/plugin-docs/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter), [Snapchat](https://docs.snap.com/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter), [Courier](https://www.courier.com/docs/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter), [1Password](https://developer.1password.com/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)...
translations.en: Et elle est loin d'Ãªtre exhaustive car de nombreux sites n'ont pas encore Ã©tÃ© ajoutÃ©s :Â [Figma](https://www.figma.com/plugin-docs/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter),Â [Snapchat](https://docs.snap.com/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter),Â [Courier](https://www.courier.com/docs/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter),Â [1Password](https://developer.1password.com/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)...

segments.source_content: Not to mention the many internal sites of companies like Microsoft, LinkedIn, Shopify...

translations.fr: Sans compter les nombreux sites internes d'entreprises comme Microsoft, LinkedIn, Shopify...
translations.en: Sans parler des nombreux sites internes d'entreprises comme Microsoft, LinkedIn, Shopify...

segments.source_content: Some examples:

translations.fr: Quelques exemples :
translations.en: Quelques exemples :

segments.source_content:
- **Big tech**: Microsoft, Snapchat, Shopify, LinkedIn, Meta, SAP, ByteDance, Lacework, Palo Alto Network...
- **Startups**: Supabase, Ionic, Hasura, Figma, Courier, CodeSandbox, StackBlitz, Redis, Algolia, Hashnode...
- **OSS**: React-Native, Redux, React-Navigation, Jest, Testing Library, Gulp, Babel, Lerna, pnpm, Electron, Tauri...
- **Web3**: Iota, Solana, Cardano, Neo, SushiSwap...

translations.fr:
- **Big tech** : Microsoft, Snapchat, Shopify, LinkedIn, Meta, SAP, ByteDance, Lacework, Palo Alto Network...
- **Startups** : Supabase, Ionic, Hasura, Figma, Courier, CodeSandbox, StackBlitz, Redis, Algolia, Hashnode...
- **OSS** : React-Native, Redux, React-Navigation, Jest, Testing Library, Gulp, Babel, Lerna, pnpm, Electron, Tauri...
- **Web3** : Iota, Solana, Cardano, Neo, SushiSwap...
translations.en:
- **Grandes techs** : Microsoft, Snapchat, Shopify, LinkedIn, Meta, SAP, ByteDance, Lacework, Palo Alto Network...
- **Startups** : Supabase, Ionic, Hasura, Figma, Courier, CodeSandbox, StackBlitz, Redis, Algolia, Hashnode...
- **Logiciels libres** : React-Native, Redux, React-Navigation, Jest, Testing Library, Gulp, Babel, Lerna, pnpm, Electron, Tauri...
- **Web3** : Iota, Solana, Cardano, Neo, SushiSwap...

segments.source_content: We also have a lot of sites with beautiful customizations that really respect the brand image of the company.

segments.source_content: ## My role in all this?

segments.source_content: I thought it was a great opportunity: working for Facebook as a freelancer on an open-source project doesn't happen every day. It was supposed to last 3 months, but it ended up lasting much longer: I've been working on Docusaurus for more than 2 years now!

Initialement prÃ©vue pour 3 mois, cette mission s'est finalement prolongÃ©e : je travaille sur Docusaurus depuis plus de 2 ans maintenant !
translations.en: Je pensais que c'Ã©tait une formidable opportunitÃ© : travailler pour Facebook en tant que freelance sur un projet open-source n'arrive pas tous les jours. Cela devait durer 3 mois, mais Ã§a a fini par durer beaucoup plus longtemps : je travaille sur Docusaurus depuis plus de 2 ans maintenant !

segments.source_content: I have the chance to work in a very flexible way, with great autonomy, which also allows me to run this newsletter on the side.

segments.source_content: It's really cool to see Docusaurus becoming popular, I really feel like my work has a real impact. I hope I've inspired you to try this tool and I can't wait to see the sites you create! Don't forget to send them to ourÂ [site showcase](https://docusaurus.io/showcase?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)!
